actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to provide for mandatory retirement of Members of Congress and the Federal judiciary.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Prohibits persons over the age of 65 years from taking office as a Member of Congress or continuing in office as a judge or magistrate in a lower court or as a Justice of the Supreme Court.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to provide for mandatory retirement of Members of Congress and the Federal judiciary.
